title: Define V1 output contract + pipeline scaffolding
summary: Codify the match output bundle and canonical track/event schemas.
Create a minimal pipeline CLI and directory layout to make subsequent vision/calibration work incremental.
non_goals: Implement the full vision pipeline (detection/tracking/calibration) beyond scaffolding and contracts.
Add non-deterministic outputs or implicit schemas that require reading code to interpret.
success_criteria: Bundle layout + required artifacts are explicit and validated by code.
Canonical record schemas are documented in the output contract template and mirrored in code types.
CLI can init/validate bundles with actionable errors suitable for CI/guardrails.

work_packages.title: Output bundle + schemas
items: TASK-V1-OUT-001 Define bundle layout + required artifacts + deterministic manifests (code + contract).
TASK-V1-DATA-001 Define canonical record schemas + metadata (code + contract).

work_packages.title: Pipeline scaffolding
items: TASK-V1-CLI-001 Minimal CLI for init/validate of bundle layout with clear errors.
